programme.desc: The inspector is called to investigate the death of a man who was shot in his bedroom. A lack of real evidence soon draws Maigret's suspicions toward a female house-guest of the deceased - who was also the beneficiary of his will. Crime drama, starring Michael Gambon

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The sleuth heads to Lake Windermere for a holiday with faithful assistant Hastings, only to find his crime-solving skills are once again needed to investigate a murder. The only witness to the crime is a dog, leaving Poirot with a difficult task to find the killer. David Suchet stars, with Kate Buffery, Patrick Ryecart and Julia St John

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Belgian sleuth's Cornish holiday comes to a dramatic conclusion as he unravels the mystery behind the series of disastrous near-misses that placed the life of a beautiful heiress in danger, and as the truth comes to light, a secret engagement is revealed. David Suchet stars, with Philip Jackson and Hugh Fraser

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: An archaeologist's wife is murdered during an excavation in the Middle East. Fortunately, a vacationing Poirot - who shares with most great detectives an inability to go on holiday without stumbling over a body or two - is on hand to investigate. Mystery, starring David Suchet, with Ron Berglas, Georgina Sowerby and Iain Mitchell

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The detective is ordered to take a holiday for the benefit of his health, and with Hastings and Miss Lemon in tow, reluctantly heads for the tranquillity of Devon's coast, where his relaxation is soon ruined by the discovery of a socialite's murdered body on the beach. Several people had reason for wishing Arlena Stuart dead, but high on the list of suspects are her husband, teenage son and a troubled vicar. David Suchet, Hugh Fraser, Philip Jackson and Pauline Moran star

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The amateur sleuths are called to a monastery to restore a herb garden in time for a royal visit - but their pruning and planting is disrupted by the discovery of a corpse. As they investigate the death, the tight-knit community closes in around them. Mystery drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The duo help reorganise the seed museum owned by the descendants of famous botanist Edwin Pargeter - but it is not long before a man is found dead in the family's garden. In an effort to trace his killer, Rosemary involves colleagues from the Royal Horticultural Society at Kew Gardens, and soon the race is on to identify a batch of mysterious seeds before it falls into the wrong hands. Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris star

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell help more people to reunite with long-lost relatives. Alice Jones was brought up by her father, but on a visit to her mother more than 50 years ago she met her younger brother called Sam and has always hoped that one day she would see him again. Mark Ratcliffe grew up in Lancashire and at the age of 12 his parents told him he was adopted and the revelation devastated him. Ever since, he cannot shake the question of how a mother could give up her child and is now looking for answers

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Home Sweet Home - Travels in My Own Land
programme.desc: After a lifetime of travels that have taken her across the globe, Joanna Lumley is making her most personal journey yet in the UK. Starting at Tilbury Docks in Essex she heads north, making a nostalgic return to Coronation Street, before ending the journey in Whitby

programme.title: Endeavour
programme.desc: Shaun Evans steps into the shoes of John Thaw in this 1965-set prequel to Inspector Morse, playing a younger version of the cerebral detective involved in the hunt for a missing schoolgirl. Soon deep in a full-blown murder investigation, Endeavour is sidelined, discredited and at a dead end - so he risks all to begin his own quest for justice. Roger Allam and Charlie Creed-Miles co-star in the mystery

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Richard's envious brother Arthur visits and, having witnessed dubious behaviour from Hudson - namely dressing up as a gentleman - he engineers a meeting between him and his employer. Classic period drama, starring Gordon Jackson, Jean Marsh and Simon Williams

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: The disgraced Elizabeth returns to Eaton Place with her unwanted child and former nursemaid in tow. Sarah is assigned as the nanny's helper, but becomes concerned about the elderly woman's ability to care for Lucy properly. Classic period drama, starring Gordon Jackson, Jean Marsh and Simon Williams

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: An actress engaged to marry a foreign prince becomes the police's number one suspect in the murder of a shady producer. Desperate to ensure she escapes prosecution, her wealthy fiance asks Poirot to catch the real killer. Unfortunately, the celebrated detective ends up concluding she has lied - or is an accomplice. David Suchet stars, with Niamh Cusack, Abigail Cruttenden and Sean Pertwee

programme.title: Emmerdale Omnibus
programme.desc: Gabby becomes frustrated, Sam gets himself in trouble and Lydia tries to come up with a plan to keep him out of prison, and there's a shock in store for Bob and Bernice.

programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.desc: Drama from the Yorkshire Dales. Lisa tries to talk some sense into Cain over Debbie

programme.desc: With Andy still in her bad books, Katie feels the need to escape the Sugden household altogether and finds herself crashing at Ollie's

programme.desc: Kirk asks if he can lodge with Les, and Bet tells Ken and Deirdre about the court case

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Drama from England's most famous cobbled street. Karen continues to push Joe as far as she can

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: A woman arrives at the depot to claim her lost property, but Stan and Jack have already eaten it. Comedy, starring Reg Varney and Bob Grant

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Tension mounts between Karen and Jacqui, and an elderly patient confides in Chris, while David comes t o Henry's aid at Goddard's - much to Simon's displeasure. Elsewhere, a patient suspected of having cancer tries to persuade his daughter to accept the new love in his life

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: The Snows battle on with life, knowing it will never be the same again without Peggy, but at least a little light relief is on the horizon in the form of the school production of The Wizard of Oz. Meanwhile, Dick and Cheryl finally get through to adopted son Oscar, who has been more of a handful than they ever expected. Rural drama, starring Lesley Dunlop and Tony Haygarth

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Nick discovers an act of courage can have sinister consequences after he rescues a woman from a house fire. Meanwhile, Greengrass sets himself up as a birdwatcher's retreat. Rural police drama, starring Nick Berry, Bill Maynard and Derek Fowlds

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A woman released from prison finds herself in danger from her former cellmate, who Nick believes may also have a connection with a post-office robbery. Jenny Agutter and Clare Higgins guest star, with Nick Berry and Derek Fowlds

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Ollie is relieved when Andy and Katie patch up their differences. Cain and Debbie grow increasingly close, while Diane and Louise set off on holiday

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Bob's stint as Woolpack manager is beset by disasters. Andy and Katie revel in their new-found freedom, but their actions place Jack in an unenviable position

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Mike undermines Joe's authority, Audrey is in reflective mood on the anniversary of Alma's death, and Fred hopes Bet will return to the Rovers

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Fred offers Bet the job of managing the Rovers, Mike persuades Joe to come back to the factory and Curly holds his first coffee morning

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A petty thief is impaled with a pitchfork in sleepy Midsomer Mallow, jeopardising the residents' chances of winning a 'perfect village' competition. To make matters worse, two of the judges are also killed. Guest starring Timothy West and Hannah Gordon, along with an early appearance by a young Orlando Bloom as the first victim

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: First episode of the costume drama set in an Edwardian country house in 1912, written by Oscar-winning writer Julian Fellowes. The lives of the Crawley family and Downton Abbey's servants are changed for ever when the sinking of the Titanic leaves the estate without its heir and his son. The arrival of a new valet shocks the staff, who scheme to make his stay as short-lived as possible. Starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Maggie, George and Ventress all become victims of poison pen letters, but when Nick investigates, it appears not everyone is admitting to receiving them

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The dapper Belgian detective, who usually only accepts cases of national importance, bends his rules for once and finds himself in run-down Clapham. He investigates the disappearance of a local cook and becomes intrigued by the contents of the woman's trunk. David Suchet stars, alongside Hugh Fraser and Brigit Forsyth

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell help more people to reunite with long-lost relatives. Martin Smith grew up in Rochdale and had a happy childhood, but struggled with intense feelings of rejection when he discovered he was adopted and only now feels ready to face his fears and find his birth mother. Anne Jordan always knew she was adopted and has been searching for her birth mother for over 30 years, but she will not set a date for her wedding to fiance Chris until she has found her

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: When a student from a prestigious all-female college is found dead, Will and Geordie infiltrate the murky world of campus politics and university societies to find the killer. Navigating strange initiations, raucous parties - and with investigative journalist, Ellie Harding, hot on their heels - they need to use every advantage at their disposal to unravel the mystery. Cathy's ambitions for a life of her own start to test the delicate family balance, while fresh from a spell with Daniel in Marrakech, Leonard finds it hard to acclimatise to life back in Grantchester. Robson Green and Tom Brittney star

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: DS Jenn Townsend, Morecambe's new Family Liaison Officer, is immediately thrown into the deep end when a body washes up in the bay on her first day on the job. She must get under the skin of a grieving and complicated family if she has any chance of solving the case, as well as navigating her blended family, who are struggling to settle in their new environment

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Tension mounts between Karen and Jacqui, and an elderly patient confides in Chris, while David comes t o Henry's aid at Goddard's - much to Simon's displeasure. Elsewhere, a patient suspected of having cancer tries to persuade his daughter to accept the new love in his life

programme.title: Where the Heart Is

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Nicola schemes to get Laurel back by sabotaging her shift. Jack reports Andy and Katie to Chris, and Scott takes advantage of Chloe's absence to plan a lads' night out

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Diane and Louise return, only to find the Woolpack in darkness. Debbie and Cain flout the rules, while Syd gets more than he bargained for on his night out

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Sarah and Aidan share their first kiss, Karen fails to tell Steve the real reason for leaving Underworld and Curly accidentally picks up someone else's baby from playgroup

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Steve lays down the law with Karen, Gail hits the roof after discovering Sarah has been seeing Ade behind her back, and Audrey catches Bet entertaining a mystery male companion

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A commercial decision to turn Midsomer Deverell's memorial garden into a tea shop proves fatal for members of the Inkpen family. DCI Barnaby's investigation unearths more than mere local hostility as he lifts the lid on long-buried secrets. Anna Calder-Marshall and Margaret Tyzack guest star

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Everyone is anxious at the arrival of Matthew Crawley, the heir presumptive, but he soon encounters problems settling into his new life in Downton, and his mother Isobel immediately crosses swords with Violet. Meanwhile, butler Carson is mortified to be confronted with his past, and housemaid Gwen seems to have a secret correspondent. Costume drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville, Dan Stevens, Penelope Wilton, Elizabeth McGovern, Jim Carter and Rose Leslie

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Nick goes undercover to track down an escaped prisoner, Greengrass discovers a couple of naturists, and Auntie Eileen has a decision to make when she meets a face from her past. Rural police drama, starring Nick Berry, Bill Maynard and Derek Fowlds

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: DCI Barnaby launches a murder investigation when the severed hand of a missing hotel manager is found by a dog. The dead man had recently been named in the will of the hotel owner, and solving the case takes on a renewed sense of urgency when fatal accidents start happening to the other beneficiaries. Mystery, guest starring Rosemary Leach and Samantha Bond, with John Nettles and Daniel Casey

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: After Will and Leonard witness a deadly and deliberate hit-and-run, Geordie traces the car to a pair of decidedly dysfunctional brothers, whose house lies far off the beaten path. The victim's wife, his employee and the two brothers are all damaged characters caught in a web of lies and betrayals - and it's not just secrets hiding within the siblings' grounds. Back at home, Will and Geordie both struggle as unwelcome guests look set to stay - Will's mum Amelia seems to have found a carbon copy of his late father in her new beau. Meanwhile, a new television set lands in the vicarage - just in time for Eurovision. Robson Green, Tom Brittney and Al Weaver star

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: An obstreperous suspect causes difficulties for the team, until Jenn identifies a key witness who is able to unlock the answers they need. Meanwhile for Manning, juggling work and his complicated family situation proves challenging. Later, a frustrating turn in the case causes tensions to rise within the community, leading to an unexpected altercation

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Henry and Jess' meal together proves productive, Simon and Anna go out on a date and Karen worries about an elderly patient's grand-daughter. Drama about community nurses living and working in a small Yorkshire town, starring Lesley Dunlop and Leslie Ash

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: The threatened closure of Goddard's following the outbreak of a virus among the children of Skelthwaite prompts Vic to speculate on the real source of the contamination. Meanwhile, Simon and Anna have relationship problems. Rural drama, starring Lesley Dunlop and Leslie Ash

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: Suzy gives Stan food from the canteen to take home - but it's stolen property. When Blakey discovers that Stan and Jack are biting the hand that feeds them, he vows to make trouble. Vintage comedy, starring Reg Varney and Stephen Lewis

programme.title: Emmerdale Omnibus
programme.desc: Gabby becomes frustrated, Sam gets himself in trouble and Lydia tries to come up with a plan to keep him out of prison, and there's a shock in store for Bob and Bernice.

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: The inspector is called to investigate the death of a man who was shot in his bedroom. A lack of real evidence soon draws Maigret's suspicions toward a female house-guest of the deceased - who was also the beneficiary of his will. Crime drama, starring Michael Gambon

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The sleuth heads to Lake Windermere for a holiday with faithful assistant Hastings, only to find his crime-solving skills are once again needed to investigate a murder. The only witness to the crime is a dog, leaving Poirot with a difficult task to find the killer. David Suchet stars, with Kate Buffery, Patrick Ryecart and Julia St John

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Belgian sleuth's Cornish holiday comes to a dramatic conclusion as he unravels the mystery behind the series of disastrous near-misses that placed the life of a beautiful heiress in danger, and as the truth comes to light, a secret engagement is revealed. David Suchet stars, with Philip Jackson and Hugh Fraser

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: An archaeologist's wife is murdered during an excavation in the Middle East. Fortunately, a vacationing Poirot - who shares with most great detectives an inability to go on holiday without stumbling over a body or two - is on hand to investigate. Mystery, starring David Suchet, with Ron Berglas, Georgina Sowerby and Iain Mitchell

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The detective is ordered to take a holiday for the benefit of his health, and with Hastings and Miss Lemon in tow, reluctantly heads for the tranquillity of Devon's coast, where his relaxation is soon ruined by the discovery of a socialite's murdered body on the beach. Several people had reason for wishing Arlena Stuart dead, but high on the list of suspects are her husband, teenage son and a troubled vicar. David Suchet, Hugh Fraser, Philip Jackson and Pauline Moran star

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The amateur sleuths are called to a monastery to restore a herb garden in time for a royal visit - but their pruning and planting is disrupted by the discovery of a corpse. As they investigate the death, the tight-knit community closes in around them. Mystery drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The duo help reorganise the seed museum owned by the descendants of famous botanist Edwin Pargeter - but it is not long before a man is found dead in the family's garden. In an effort to trace his killer, Rosemary involves colleagues from the Royal Horticultural Society at Kew Gardens, and soon the race is on to identify a batch of mysterious seeds before it falls into the wrong hands. Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris star

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell help more people to reunite with long-lost relatives. Alice Jones was brought up by her father, but on a visit to her mother more than 50 years ago she met her younger brother called Sam and has always hoped that one day she would see him again. Mark Ratcliffe grew up in Lancashire and at the age of 12 his parents told him he was adopted and the revelation devastated him. Ever since, he cannot shake the question of how a mother could give up her child and is now looking for answers

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Home Sweet Home - Travels in My Own Land
programme.desc: After a lifetime of travels that have taken her across the globe, Joanna Lumley is making her most personal journey yet in the UK. Starting at Tilbury Docks in Essex she heads north, making a nostalgic return to Coronation Street, before ending the journey in Whitby

programme.title: Endeavour
programme.desc: Shaun Evans steps into the shoes of John Thaw in this 1965-set prequel to Inspector Morse, playing a younger version of the cerebral detective involved in the hunt for a missing schoolgirl. Soon deep in a full-blown murder investigation, Endeavour is sidelined, discredited and at a dead end - so he risks all to begin his own quest for justice. Roger Allam and Charlie Creed-Miles co-star in the mystery

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Richard's envious brother Arthur visits and, having witnessed dubious behaviour from Hudson - namely dressing up as a gentleman - he engineers a meeting between him and his employer. Classic period drama, starring Gordon Jackson, Jean Marsh and Simon Williams

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: The disgraced Elizabeth returns to Eaton Place with her unwanted child and former nursemaid in tow. Sarah is assigned as the nanny's helper, but becomes concerned about the elderly woman's ability to care for Lucy properly. Classic period drama, starring Gordon Jackson, Jean Marsh and Simon Williams

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot

programme.desc: A look back at a selection of sports covered by ITV during the 1980s, ranging from football and boxing to wrestling and double decker racing

programme.title: Live Snooker: Players Championship
programme.desc: Coverage of the evening session of the final from Aldersley Village in Wolverhampton, where the first player to reach 10 frames will win the title. Neil Robertson prevailed 10-5 here against Barry Hawkins last year to win this title for the first time in his illustrious career, having twice finished as runner-up under the tournament's former guise as the Players Tour Championship finals and once in its current format. Rishi Persad presents, with analysis from Stephen Hendry, Alan McManus, Neal Foulds and Ken Doherty, commentary by David Hendon and Phil Yates, and reports from Rob Walker

programme.desc: Hardened fighters from all over the world, including military veterans and ruthless criminals, are abducted by aliens and transported to a dangerous jungle world. Sci-fi thriller sequel, with Adrien Brody, Topher Grace, Alice Braga, Danny Trejo and Laurence Fishburne

programme.title: Live FA Cup Football
programme.desc: Stoke City v Brighton & Hove Albion (Kick-off 7.15pm). Mark Pougatch presents all the action from the fifth-round tie at Bet365 Stadium. Stoke have defeated Hartlepool United and Stevenage to reach this stage, but they have struggled in the Championship so far this season and are underdogs this evening. The Seagulls have impressed in the Premier League in the current campaign and thrashed Middlesbrough in round three before eliminating last season's cup-winners Liverpool. With analysis by Glenn Murray and Karen Carney, commentary from Clive Tyldesely and Lee Dixon, and reports by Katie Shanahan

Red Son takes over the Weather Station, a prestigious club that allows its members to control the weather in different parts of the city, in order to restore his father the Demon Bull King back to power - Monkie Kid attempts to defeat Red Son but has a hard time controlling his power, so the Monkey King limits MK's powers so that he can use them effectively until he has time to train and learn to fully control them.

programme.title: LEGO Monkie Kid
programme.desc: Animated series following a young teenager on a mission to save the world. After Tang mentions the famed power of the Monkey King to duplicate himself, Monkie Kid decides to create clones so he can stay home and play video games after he has to do a lot of work for his friends - however, he doesn't know how to use his powers, and so the clones wreak havoc...

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Avengers: Climate Conundrum
programme.desc: Animated series based on the Marvel superhero team. The Environmental Clean-Up Conference is off to anything but a smooth start when Tony Stark realises that his fellow competitor is his rival Justin Hammer, but when a mysterious saboteur turns the inventions at the conference against the scientists there, it's up to Iron Man to save the day. At the same time, Captain America finally has a day off but cannot decide what to do with his free time - then the forces of AIM attack...

programme.title: Overlord and the Underwoods

programme.title: Dare Master

programme.title: Drop Dead Weird
programme.desc: Comedy drama following the adventures of an Australian family who move to an isolated seaside village in western Ireland, with the parents having a secret to hide

programme.title: Makeaway Takeaway
programme.desc: A comedy arts and crafts show for six to 11-year-olds and presented by comedian Bec Hill. Bec wants to get Makeaway Takeaway into the Big Book of Wacky Records, but can she succeed? She comes up with a winning technique to create the perfect straight line in the process, and a customer calls needing help to stop him and his mates arguing over what to do, resulting in some giant-sized 'Decision Dentures' - Bec also creates a pencil case almost good enough to eat with just three ingredients!

programme.title: Ted's Top Ten
programme.desc: Comedy series following the misadventures of Ted and his friends and family. Ted's keen to make a big impression on his first day of high school, believing he's done just that when he completes an initiation on the school bus by mooning a nearby car, but there's a problem - the driver of the car is deputy head Mr Rodman! Ted, Jai and Cody must now break into that same car to retrieve the incriminating evidence from the dash cam - meanwhile, Jada is busy trying to join an exclusive study group.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Animated comedy featuring two trouble-making young friends who re-imagine their grumpy headmaster as a superhero looking to fight crime and save their city. Krupp has re-separated George and Harold between the two camps, so the boys 'borrow' Melvin's new machine that makes animals smart and create a super-smart possum named Ragely in order to keep Krupp in line, but Ragely isn't satisfied by merely taking the camps from Krupp - he wants to take over civilisation for the animals!

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Mo and Sam are thrilled because they're going to the premiere of Galaxy Revengers Part 2 - the most amazing superhero movie of all time - but Mo's excitement cools when his father, the Mayor, enlists him for a celebrity photoshoot in the countryside. The only way that Mo can attend the shoot and get back in time for the movie premiere is to ask for the power of teleportation - to make sure everything works according to plan, Mo drags his half-sister along without asking.

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Sam bets JC that her hamster Hammy can do the same trick as the most popular animal on the internet and agrees to produce a video before the end of the day to prove it - when her initial attempts to train Hammy fail, she asks the Sceptre for the power to communicate with animals, but with only half of the power, Sam can't help behaving just like whatever animal she looks at in the eye, and the same goes for Mo, who starts acting like a small menagerie on his own too!

programme.desc: Marge suffers a nervous breakdown and has to be packed off for a well-earned rest, leaving Lisa and Bart with Patty and Selma, and Homer alone with Maggie

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer are joined by guests Judi Love, JLS, Jamie Demetriou and John Robins, and there is live music by The Lathums

programme.title: Live Betfred Super League Rugby
programme.desc: Castleford Tigers v St Helens (Kick-off 1.00pm). Adam Hills presents all the action from the clash in the second round of fixtures, held at Mend-a-Hose Jungle. The Saints won their fourth successive title last season and get their campaign under way in this match after facing Penrith Panthers in the World Club Challenge last week. In contrast, their opponents will be looking to improve after finishing one place outside the play-offs in 2022. With analysis from Kyle Amor, Ash Golding and Danika Priim

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: The architect meets master craftsman Paul, who has muscular dystrophy and is saving a Victorian circus wagon. George also finds out about a grain store being re-imagined as a festival bar, discovers a small hotel disguised as a tree and a camping pod that looks like a giant conker

programme.title: Devon and Cornwall
programme.desc: In the fold of the foothills of Exmoor, Devon farmers Rob and Sarah Taylor prepare their native ponies for the show season, but first they need to round them up from off the moor. At the southern tip of Cornwall, the South West Coastal Path is under threat of erosion from the thousands of footsteps veering off the marked track each year

programme.title: Matt Baker: Our Farm in the Dales
programme.desc: In summer, the sheep are sheared and Matt makes plans for a new home for the chickens that will give them access to free-range grazing. The family attempts the first honey harvest. It is movie night in the courtyard as the footage captured by the wildlife cameras in the woodlands is finally revealed. With the body of the Dodge lifted off its chassis, the engine at its heart has been revealed

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: The Andrew Neil Show
programme.desc: As the government faces a growing backbench rebellion over the Northern Ireland protocol, Andrew is joined by Deputy Prime Minister Dominic Raab and former Irish PM Bertie Ahern. Regular guests Ed Balls and George Osborne discuss ongoing strike negotiations, the cost of living crisis, and supermarket food shortages

programme.title: World's Most Secret Hotels
programme.desc: Including a trip to the Scottish wilderness in search of spaceships and a visit to the Welsh mountains to probe some mysterious looking spheres. Plus, a tower in Greece with a deadly history and a hotel perched on a glacier in Italy

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down
programme.desc: It's the quarter-final, and the remaining five potters face an altered reality as they throw and radically alter an abstract coffee set. The bucket of doom returns as judges Keith and Rich set a second challenge to throw multiple high-footed rice bowls under pressure, but who will secure an all-important place in the semi-final?

programme.title: Guy Martin's Great British Power Trip
programme.desc: Guy investigates the future of energy production, travelling to Orkney to look at how the Scottish islands are at the forefront of hydrogen research. He also joins the workforce at Europe's biggest building site and the Hinkley Point C nuclear power station, finding out why reactors are so expensive and take 10 years to build, and works inside Britain's most toxic site - handling nuclear waste inside the Sellafield facility

programme.title: Untold: The Secret World of Incels
programme.desc: Filmmaker Ben Zand investigates the dark world of incels, the term that describes a man who is hostile towards women due to their inability to attract them. After a year-long investigation, Zand gains unprecedented access to the men behind the keyboards. Research finds the community is rapidly growing, as one of the most extreme incel forums has 18,000 members - with around 2,500 in the UK, and the documentary also features a British incel who has never had a proper conversation with a woman in real life

programme.desc: A tough female pirate enlists the help of an educated slave in finding the three parts of a map leading to buried treasure. programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II (1988)
programme.desc: The rugged Australian adventurer sets out to save his reporter girlfriend from New York drug dealers. Having rescued her from their clutches, he realises they will soon be coming after him - so he decides to even the odds by luring them to the Outback for a final showdown. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon and Charles S Dutton

programme.title: City Slickers (1991)
programme.desc: Three middle-aged men take a break from the rat race and their mid-life crises to join a two-week cattle drive from New Mexico to Colorado. Together with a bunch of fellow urbanites, they find the going much tougher than expected, and it is down to a real-life cowboy to whip them into shape. Comedy adventure, starring Billy Crystal, Daniel Stern, Bruno Kirby and Jack Palance, who won an Oscar for his performance as grizzled trail boss Curly

programme.title: Star Trek Into Darkness (2013)
programme.desc: Captain Kirk and the crew of the starship Enterprise are sent on a clandestine mission into enemy territory to track down the rogue Starfleet agent behind a terrorist attack on Earth. However, the assignment brings to light a hidden threat from within their own organisation. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Benedict Cumberbatch

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence (2016)
programme.desc: Two decades have passed since Earth was saved from an extraterrestrial invasion, and in the years since, the aliens' salvaged technology has been used to transform the world. However, it may not be enough to save the human race when a second, even deadlier attack begins. Sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Bill Pullman

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection (2016)
programme.desc: Hitman Arthur Bishop's arch-enemy Crain kidnaps his new girlfriend Gina and blackmails him into committing three assassinations in as many days, while making them look like accidents. Action thriller sequel, starring Jason Statham, Jessica Alba, Sam Hazeldine and Tommy Lee Jones

programme.title: Last Orders (2001)
programme.desc: Four men visit Margate to scatter the ashes of a beloved lifelong friend. They stop at a number of places on the way, where they recall fond memories of the deceased and reminisce about their shared experiences over the last six decades. Drama, based on the novel by Graham Swift, with Michael Caine, Bob Hoskins, Tom Courtenay, David Hemmings, Ray Winstone and Helen Mirren

programme.title: Distant Drums (1951)
programme.desc: An army officer mounts a daring raid through the treacherous Florida swamplands. His mission is to take on a group of marauding Seminole rebels, as well as the gun runners who have been supplying them with weapons, and rescue a group of settlers who have been taken hostage by the tribe. Western, starring Gary Cooper, Mari Aldon, Richard Webb, Ray Teal and Arthur Hunnicutt

programme.title: Stalag 17 (1953)
programme.desc: The inmates of a German PoW camp are convinced there is a traitor in their midst when the guards seem to be forewarned of their escape attempts. An unassuming sergeant content to remain a captive until the end of the conflict becomes the focus of suspicion as mob mentality takes hold. Billy Wilder's Second World War drama, starring an Oscar-winning William Holden, with Don Taylor, Otto Preminger and Harvey Lembeck

programme.title: Reach for the Sky (1956)
programme.desc: Biopic of Second World War hero Douglas Bader. A plane crash in 1931 cost the aspiring pilot both his legs, but after learning to walk on artificial limbs, he went on to become one of the RAF's most decorated heroes. However, more misfortune was in store when he was shot down over occupied France and taken prisoner. Starring Kenneth More, Muriel Pavlow and Alexander Knox

programme.title: The Martian (2015)
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last the crew a month. Ridley Scott's sci-fi drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: Bloodshot (2020)
programme.desc: Marine Ray Garrison is shot dead during a mission but regains consciousness in Kuala Lumpur in the care of Dr Emil Harting. The medic brought Ray back to life using nanotechnology, augmenting the Marine's strength, agility, speed and healing capabilities on the battlefield. Rechristened Bloodshot, Garrison wages top-secret war alongside other enhanced killing machines, while piecing together a conspiracy that robbed him of the woman he loved. Sci-fi thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Eiza Gonzalez and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Happy Death Day (2017)
programme.desc: A college student wakes up hungover in a fellow student's bed with no memory of the night before. She is rude and mean to those she finds around her, until a strange character in an angry baby mask appears and kills her. However, that is not her demise, as she finds herself repeatedly reliving the day of her murder until the true identity of her killer is revealed. Black comedy horror, starring Jessica Rothe, Israel Broussard and Ruby Modine

programme.title: Girl (2018)
programme.desc: A transgender teenager struggles with the competing physical and emotional demands of transition and training as a ballerina. She faces a terrible choice when she is told she must give up her training to regain weight and strength before she can have surgery. Drama, starring Victor Polster and Arieh Worthalter. In French, Flemish and English

programme.title: The Tin Star (1957)
programme.desc: A world-weary bounty hunter, formerly a sheriff, arrives in a small town where a newly-appointed lawman is struggling to keep the peace. When he learns of the mercenary's past, the inexperienced lawman seeks his help in learning the tricks of the trade so he can bring an outlaw gang to justice. Anthony Mann's Western, starring Henry Fonda, Anthony Perkins, Lee Van Cleef, Betsy Palmer and Michel Ray

programme.title: Crack in the World (1965)
programme.desc: A dying scientist and his colleagues conduct experiments to harness the Earth's inner energy that seem set to end in disaster. Sci-fi thriller, with Dana Andrews, Janette Scott, Kieron Moore and Alexander Knox

programme.title: Last Train from Gun Hill (1959)
programme.desc: A marshal discovers the man responsible for raping and killing his wife is actually the son of an old friend, setting the scene for a showdown. Western, starring Kirk Douglas, Anthony Quinn, Brian Hutton and Carolyn Jones

programme.title: Shenandoah (1965)
programme.desc: A Virginian farmer is left to raise seven children after his wife dies. He tries to keep his family out of the American Civil War, but when Union troops abduct his son, and his son-in-law enlists with the Confederates, he is unable to maintain his neutral stance and is dragged into the conflict. Western, starring James Stewart, Doug McClure, Rosemary Forsyth, Katharine Ross and Patrick Wayne

programme.title: Made in America (1993)
programme.desc: A black teenager who discovers she was conceived through artificial insemination asks her mother to track down the biological father. However, because of a mix-up in the sperm bank the donor is a brash second-hand car salesman - and white - with little inclination to take on the responsibilities of parenthood. Romantic comedy, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Ted Danson, Nia Long and Will Smith

programme.title: Happy Death Day 2U (2019)
programme.desc: College student Tree Gelbman repeatedly lived through her own murder at the hands of a killer in a baby mask, until she learned how to outwit him and escape her fate. However, she is now stuck in another murderous time-loop, and has to face up to a fresh killer. Horror comedy sequel, starring Jessica Rothe, Israel Broussard and Phi Vu

programme.title: Meet the Parents (2000)
programme.desc: A male nurse delays proposing to his girlfriend until he has won the approval of her strict father, a former CIA agent who does not suffer fools gladly, and vows to be on his best behaviour during a visit to her family home. However, his efforts to impress soon collapse into a catalogue of disasters. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Ben Stiller, Teri Polo, Blythe Danner and Owen Wilson

programme.title: The Motorcycle Diaries (2004)
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, chronicling the travels of a young Che Guevara. In 1952, the future revolutionary is a medical student who plans to serve his residency in a leper colony. Seeking a little excitement along the way, he and a friend decide to travel to the colony by motorbike, a journey that will take them across South America. However, both men are changed forever by the things they see along the way. Starring Gael Garcia Bernal, Rodrigo de la Serna, Mia Maestro and Gustavo Bueno. In Spanish, Quechua and Mapudungun

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Warren's day goes from bad to worse when his child goes missing and a health scare leads him to devastating assumptions. Felix may have found the ideal venue for his new youth club

programme.title: Bee Movie (2007)
programme.desc: A bee wearies of a life dedicated to producing honey and decides to leave his hive. During his foray into the wider world, he befriends a florist. However, when he realises what becomes of the honey his species toils so hard to make, he resolves to sue the entire human race for stealing from his fellow creatures. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jerry Seinfeld, Renee Zellweger and Chris Rock

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Part one of two. Gordon Ramsay heads to Harpers Ferry in West Virginia, where he tries to save the Town's Inn, a historic hotel run by retired teacher and junk hoarder Karan Townsend. She has accumulated so many useless belongings that there is hardly any room to accommodate guests. Can Gordon convince her to get rid of her clutter or will the hotel continue to go down the pan?

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Part two of two. Gordon Ramsay continues his battle to restore the failing Town's Inn in Harpers Ferry, West Virginia. After witnessing abysmal food hygiene practices in the restaurant, the chef is left in disbelief as he uncovers terrifying cleanliness issues throughout the hotel. Can he win over stubborn owner Karan Townsend and persuade her to turn things round?

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay checks into the luxurious Lakeview Hotel on Lake Chelan, Washington, where the bedrooms are empty and the hotel's restaurant and ice-cream parlour are failing. Gordon confronts owner Brent's inappropriate and miserly behaviour, but is it enough to repair the establishment's reputation?

programme.title: Playing with Fire (2019)
programme.desc: A straight-laced fire superintendent and his elite team of expert firefighters come to the rescue of three siblings in the path of an encroaching wildfire, but quickly realise that no amount of training could prepare them for their most challenging job yet - as their babysitters. Comedy, starring John Cena, Keegan-Michael Key and John Leguizamo

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Bernadette and Howard host a dinner party, but as it falls on Sheldon's Thai food night, he opts to bring his own dinner. As punishment for his lack of manners, the gang decides he should organise Wolowitz's cluttered wardrobe, but he discovers an unopened letter from Howard's father, who hasn't made contact in years

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys compete for a tenured professor position at the university, leading them to try to win over the committee in charge of appointing a new staff member, and arguing about who deserves the spot the most. However, the panel includes Mrs Davis from Human Resources, whom Sheldon has crossed paths with before. Guest starring Regina King

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy tries to help Sheldon get over his desire for closure when one of his favourite TV shows is cancelled on a cliffhanger ending. Raj discovers his new girlfriend Lucy has a blog in which she has written about him, and is upset when he learns she believes he has feminine qualities, causing him to worry about their relationship

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon discover their favourite childhood TV science show host Professor Proton can be booked for private parties and decide to hire him to entertain them. Meanwhile, Raj asks Howard and Bernadette to look after his dog for the weekend, but the couple panic when the canine goes missing. Guest starring Bob Newhart

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys invite the girls to a Dungeons and Dragons night when their trip to Vegas falls through after an incident with airport security. However, following a few drinks, Sheldon and Amy's relationship takes an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Raj goes on a date with Lucy, who tries to sneak out of the restaurant's bathroom window - but ends up getting stuck and calling for his help

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is offered an exciting job opportunity, but it will mean he has to leave the country for several months. Penny tries to support his ambitions, while Sheldon is jealous and attempts to discourage him from accepting the post. Meanwhile, Raja pushes the boundaries with Lucy, but puts their relationship in jeopardy

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Penny bond as they miss Leonard, and Howard tries to help Raj get over his break-up with Lucy. Meanwhile, Bernadette and Amy visit an out-of-town biology convention. Comedy about four high-achieving scientists, starring Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki

programme.title: Lego Masters Australia
programme.desc: The teams must create wind-powered builds, with Caleb and Alex deciding to create a wizard casting a spell, while Joss and Henry put together a moving caterpillar

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones goes in search of the legendary Ark of the Covenant, a biblical artefact of devastating power. His quest leads him to Egypt, where the Nazis are plotting to use the Ark to further Hitler's plans for world domination - aided by Jones's deceitful French rival. The first of five big-screen action adventures, starring Harrison Ford as Indy, with Karen Allen, Paul Freeman and John Rhys-Davies

programme.title: Instant Family (2018)
programme.desc: After being taunted by relatives who think they will never have kids, married couple Pete and Ellie Wagner consider the option of adopting a child. However, they get more than they bargained for when they take in a rebellious teen and her two siblings. Director Sean Anders' comedy, starring Mark Wahlberg, Rose Byrne and Isabela Merced

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britain's armchair critics share more of their critiques of the week's biggest and best shows. They've been watching Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?, (Un)well, Extinction: The Facts, Des, The Third Day, BBC News on the R number, and Breakfast with Michael Gove on Brexit

programme.title: Summer House
programme.desc: The Vanderpumps continue their visit and become bystanders in a house-wide divide when Kyle accuses Paige of leading Carl on

programme.title: Summer House
programme.desc: The crew gets together for one more epic 'death of summer' party, and Kyle asks for Amanda's father's blessing for an engagement

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Warren's day goes from bad to worse when his child goes missing and a health scare leads him to devastating assumptions. Felix may have found the ideal venue for his new youth club

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Peri turns to Rayne and Lacey for advice, Shing Lin leads Charlie astray, and James and Ste decides to see what it would be like if they lived together

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: The Osborne family head to The Dog for dinner after Nancy's big presentation. An offer from Tony might mean that Felix has the right venue for his youth club

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay continues his travels across America saving failing restaurants from disaster. In the first of two visits to Mill Street Bistro in Norwalk, Ohio, the chef encounters Joe Nagy, who claims he has the best menu from New York to Los Angeles. However, his servers and diners tell a different story, and his resistance to change leads to some explosive confrontations

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: A look at what happened after Gordon Ramsay headed to Scottsdale, Arizona, where he met husband-and-wife bistro owners Samy and Amy Bouzaglo, who revealed a shocking contempt for customer feedback. The chef faced the biggest challenge of the series to save Amy's Baking Company - and a media furore unfolded after the episode was broadcast

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry enlists his friends to help him break up Beverly's social group in order to get more of his mother's attention, but when big arguments ensue he realises he's made a major error. Adam's attempts to trick Murray into loving the theatre backfire

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Hoping to enjoy a true spring break experience, Erica and Barry pay a visit to Pops in Florida, but the jaunt isn't what they expected. Adam tells the truth to his parents when he has a mishap with Beverly's new coat, but he gets a surprising reaction

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj endures an anxious day as he worries that a space probe he helped design will not function properly, while Leonard and Sheldon agree to go clothes shopping with Penny and Amy. Comedy, starring Kunal Nayyar, Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon becomes concerned that his comfortable lifestyle is having an impact on his professional progress and is stopping him from achieving scientific greatness, so he asks the gang to make life more difficult for him. Meanwhile, Howard invents an unflattering game about Raj. Starring Jim Parsons and Simon Helberg

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Claire make Mitch and Cameron a life-changing promise after drinking heavily at a restaurant, and Jay's concerns about Manny and Gloria's relationship are eased when he learns more about their mother-son bond. American comedy, starring Ty Burrell and Julie Bowen

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil struggles to come to terms with the fact Haley is growing up after overhearing a private conversation, and Jay's ego takes a bruising when Mitchell tells the truth about his proudest golf moment. Meanwhile, Gloria discovers Claire's stress-relieving activity. American comedy, starring Ty Burrell and Ed O'Neill

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The squad takes Holt up on an offer for a weekend getaway. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg and Melissa Fumero

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Captain Holt and Amy manage an understaffed precinct. Meanwhile, Jake and Charles investigate. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy and Sheldon are still feeling down about their theory being disproven, until an old VHS tape from Sheldon's past inspires the couple not to give up

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon becomes jealous when Amy gets attention in the media, Raj spots Anu talking to her ex-boyfriend, and Stuart is intimidated by the idea of moving in with Denise, all of which cause mayhem when Penny and Leonard organise a paintball game

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard questions his engineering abilities when he and Sheldon can't get a toy drone to fly. A cancelled flight almost stops Leonard from giving the commencement address at his former high school, while Raj pits his parents against each other when his father cuts him off financially

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: There is a clash of personalities when Sheldon and Leonard's mothers finally meet, while Howard finally decides to do his fair share of the housework - but not without a little help from his friends. Guest starring Christine Baranski and Laurie Metcalf

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Claire try to squeeze in some time alone, while Mitch and Cam make a big decision. American comedy following the lives of three dysfunctional households - a man who struggles to keep up with his younger wife, an embarrassing husband and a gay couple getting used to parenthood after adopting a Vietnamese baby. Starring Ed O'Neill and Julie Bowen

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Nerves jangle as Luke and Manny face their first day at high school. Cam takes on a substitute gig, leaving Mitch to look after Lily. American comedy, starring Eric Stonestreet and Jesse Tyler Ferguson

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake is assigned to a minor graffiti case by Captain Holt as punishment for turning up late for work, but the investigation becomes a major headache when the vandal's identity is revealed. Meanwhile, Gina's psychic friend Carlene visits the precinct to help with a case, and upsets Charles with a prediction about his romantic life. American comedy, starring Andy Samberg

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: For the first time in his career, Jake has a growing number of cases he just can't seem to solve, and the other detectives worry his run of bad luck will rub off on them. Holt asks Amy to take charge of a community outreach programme for at-risk youths, and Boyle helps Jeffords with a tough personal assignment. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg and Andre Braugher

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard returns from his research expedition in the North Sea and undergoes an adjustment period with Sheldon. Howard experiences an unusual emotional reaction as a result of his relationship with his mother. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Simon Helberg star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends compete in a scavenger hunt designed by Raj to test their scientific knowledge and life skills, but the game brings out the best and worst in everyone. As the hunt progresses, Howard and Amy begin to bond over their shared musical tastes, while Penny and Sheldon work together as a team and Bernadette becomes fiercely competitive

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj is worried that people won't take him seriously in his own field after publishing a paper that suggests he may have discovered alien life. Penny encourages Leonard to stand up for himself when he aims to become the principal investigator on a plasma physics study

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Barry Kripke finds proof that Dr Pemberton plagiarised his thesis in college, Sheldon and Amy aren't sure whether they should turn their rival in or not. Howard is surprised but happy to learn that Bernadette wasn't the only waitress at The Cheesecake Factory who had a crush on him back in the day

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: A secret tip-off gives Sam and Zoe the evidence they need. Meanwhile, Honour receives another visit from the police asking for details from the party

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Edinburgh, Christian radio DJ and gospel singer Eloho, hopes to take her guests to church, gospel-style, with a music-filled evening. She's also hoping her traditional Nigerian fare will serve up all things spice and nice to her guest

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Denver, Colorado, where he meets the stubborn owner of Italian restaurant Pantaleone's, who appears to be firmly stuck in the past. Pete maintains he makes the best pizza in town - based on a review from the 1980s - but the fiery chef's own taste test proves the opposite. With Pete's wife Paulette and son Josh threatening to leave, can Gordon get through to him and save the business?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Arvada, Colorado, where a husband and wife have allowed their restaurant to fall into disrepair. Randy's hoarding is out of control, while Alexa, who runs the kitchen, has a lot to learn. To make matters worse, the Old Neighborhood is one of the filthiest eateries the fiery chef has ever seen, and only one of the biggest transformations of the series can save the business

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly takes up dancing with her friends but is dejected when her family is unimpressed by her intention to perform a dance routine in a recital. Adam worries about losing his friendship with Emmy when she starts dating a handsome older classmate, but his attempts to be cooler than the newcomer backfire

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard receives shocking news as everyone prepares for the re-opening of the comic-book store. Penny tries to teach Sheldon how to 'let it go', but she is unable to follow her own advice when she learns something infuriating about Amy. Comedy, guest starring Nathan Fillion, with Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

American comedy, starring Eric Stonestreet, Jesse Tyler Ferguson and Ty Burrell

programme.title: Modern Family

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

Back home, Sheldon doesn't know how to act after Amy tells him she wants them to take a relationship break

Phil taps into a rich new vein of clients - recently divorced women - but are they more trouble than they're worth? American comedy, starring Sofia Vergara, Eric Stonestreet and Ty Burrell

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Cam's older sister is in town but he is scared to share his engagement news with her because she is a sad, lonely singleton. Or so he thinks. Phil and Claire feel guilty when they make a joint decision to skip Luke's volleyball game and Jay tells Gloria she needs reading glasses - but she's not having any of it. The 100th episode of the family sitcom, starring Eric Stonetreet, Ty Burrell, Julie Bowen and Ed O'Neill

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake meets an attractive medical examiner at a crime scene, but annoys his colleagues when his attempts to get together with her cause a hold-up with an autopsy report. Meanwhile, Amy discovers Jeffords has some hidden talents when the police sketch artist goes off sick

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Johnny Galecki

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is pleasantly surprised when his mother Beverly arrives and is genuinely kind to him - until he finds out the real reason for her visit. Denise and Stuart overstay their welcome at Howard and Bernadette's. Christine Baranski guest stars

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy stay up all night as they await a telephone call that could bring big news from the Nobel Committee - is everything in their lives about to change?

She's matched with 30-year-old beautician Sophie, who's on the lookout for a life partner. Plus, actress Alice meets 26-year-old cocktail bartender Jac, who is hoping to shake his life up a bit

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their thoughts on shows from October 2020, including Ratched, Council House Britain, Family Fortunes, This Morning, Jamie: Keep Cooking Family Favourites, First Dates and BBC News coverage of royal finances, students and the moment the Prime Minister appeared to be confused by his own rules

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on shows including The Traitors, Gino's Cooking up Love, Lady Chatterley's Lover, I Can See Your Voice, Blowing LA, This Morning and White Christmas

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: A romp through the Naked Attraction archive to catch up with dates that led to full-on romances - as well as some that turned out to be a disaster. They include Wolverhampton DJ Darryl from series one, who found his partner in Maria, and Scottish bombshell Amira from series five, who gives the lowdown on what really happened between her and Ste after their night of passion

programme.title: Below Deck: Mediterranean
programme.desc: The crew scrambles to help Kyle after a tumble down the stairs. Later, Natasha must make a difficult decision about the future of her department

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Denver, Colorado, where he meets the stubborn owner of Italian restaurant Pantaleone's, who appears to be firmly stuck in the past. Pete maintains he makes the best pizza in town - based on a review from the 1980s - but the fiery chef's own taste test proves the opposite. With Pete's wife Paulette and son Josh threatening to leave, can Gordon get through to him and save the business?

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly and Murray grow concerned about Adam's obsession with toys, so try to distract him with a new hobby. Meanwhile, Erica's band the Dropouts decide to audition for reality television talent show Star Search, but their egos threaten the band's future

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry realises that as a future doctor, he should be more concerned about Murray's health, so he enlists the Jenkintown Posse and Coach Mellor to help get his father in shape. Meanwhile, Beverly is horrified to learn that Erica and Adam don't want any of the priceless heirlooms in her fancy, never-really-used living room

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: The architect meets a West Sussex couple planning to build a house on the back of an old trailer, while in Wiltshire, a single mother plans to transform an old military helicopter, and a water tower undergoes a surprising conversion in Warwickshire. George's tour of Spain continues in northern Andalusia, where he visits a cave-style retreat quarried deep into the mountains

programme.title: Ugly House to Lovely House with George Clarke
programme.desc: The idyllic village of Hartley Wintney is often voted one of the best places to live in Britain - but every rose has its thorn. Fiona and Hugh's ugly Hampshire home has not been touched in decades, and they hate absolutely everything except the garden. They have ¬£180,000 budget to transform the entire house, so George enlists award-winning architect Greg Blee. However, while the owners buy into his modernist scheme the local planners do not. Can he salvage his design and come up with a scheme that will tick all the boxes?

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House, New Home
programme.desc: The presenter attempts to unlock the potential of old houses, including the rules when it comes to putting a kitchen in a period home. He also meets a woman who bought a 400-year-old Devon cottage, and has some solutions for turning this old house into a new home

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Simran Samra hosts the first party in east London, and decides to cook meat for her main course, despite being a vegetarian. The fashionista tries to salvage her chances of winning the ¬£1,000 prize by performing a range of comedy accents after fellow competitor Alan Price upsets one of the guests

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Comedian Yoshki Greenberg hosts the second dinner party in east London, but her decision to surprise the guests by asking them to wear animal-themed pyjama suits does not go down well - leaving her struggling to win them over with a stand-up routine

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Alan Price hosts the third party in east London, and sets out to impress his fellow competitors with a medieval-themed dinner. He hopes to raise the standard of the contest with an ambitious menu, but stumbles at the first hurdle when vegetarian diner Simran Samra panics at the sight of his authentic pig's head as the table centrepiece. Things do not improve as the night goes on, with dirty dinner plates and sloppy hosting leaving the guests less than impressed

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Bar owner Delia Elliot hosts the fourth dinner party from east London, and she is confident she can teach her young diners the protocol of entertaining guests. However, prankster Alan Price ends up having an argument with her, leading Simran Samra to take evasive action

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Doctor Chintu Gademsetty hosts the final dinner party in east London, and is confident of impressing his guests with a 1980s-themed evening. Even though his dance competition is not a hit with all of the diners, his food goes down a treat, before the winner of the ¬£1,000 prize is announced

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition begins at Oaklea Barns Guest House on Merseyside, where Mandi Magee and her partner Paul Green think their impeccable standards will wow their rivals. Guest Ian loves his room but is perplexed by plastic on the lampshades, while Mark and Natalie are thrown by a loose loo. During an exercise in falconry, Dave and Sanchia cry foul when chirpy Mandi rules the roost. At breakfast, Mandi makes it clear she thinks she can't be beaten, but Dave and Sanchia say they'll rise to the challenge

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to The Guest House Worsthorne in Lancashire, where partners Dave Rogers and Sanchia Crossley aim to win over their guests

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: For the third visit of the week, the group heads to the Sleeperdorm Backpacker Hotel in Newcastle, where Ian Nicholls hopes his guests will enjoy his cheap and cheerful concept

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&B battle continues at the Parsonage Hotel and Spa near York, a 55-room country manor which wows the guests with its size, although Mandi's high cleaning standards are not met

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final day of the competition sees the B&B owners meet for the last time to find out what they've been paid and to settle some scores. Oaklea Barns is first, and hosts Mandi and Paul want answers from Mark and Natalie, which ends up fanning flames

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Posh girl-about-town Liv Sargeant hosts the first party in Bath, and hopes to impress with her sophisticated evening, complete with black-tie dress code. However, her unusual choice of entertainment, and her undying love for Michael Buble, threaten to hamper her chances of winning the ¬£1,000 prize at the end of the week

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Former raver Mel Lewis-Leger hosts the second dinner party in Bath, but her taste in music and a spicy Cajun menu prove off-putting for some of the guests. Meanwhile, cafe worker Becky Tyler becomes more sociable, until she decides to do an impression of one of her fellow diners

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Handyman Jon Wicheard hosts the third dinner party in Bath. Denis Verrier suspects the food will not be up to his exacting standards, and sandwich enthusiast Becky Tyler also doubts the meal will be a success. The prospect of a disco excites vegetarian and former raver Mel Lewis-Leger, but society girl Liv Sargeant dreads the thought of any form of forced entertainment

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Cafe worker Becky Tyler hosts the fourth dinner-party challenge from Bath. The theme is a 'Mad Hat' tea party, and she sets out to put on a menu of British classics, but the round of sandwiches for starters might prove too much for the diners

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Patriotic Frenchman Denis Verrier hosts the final dinner party in Bath, and hopes his experience of working in the hospitality industry will stand him in good stead. However, two of the guests are shocked by what they find in his wardrobe, and his staging of a penalty shoot-out provides more surprises, before the winner of the ¬£1,000 prize is announced

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: Medics battle to keep 48-year-old Paul alive as he suffers a series of heart attacks. Roger's emergency stop halts his day at a scooter rally while, in Cumbria, there's a dramatic mountainside rescue for seriously injured cyclist Nick

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Documentary following life inside the A&E department of St George's in south-west London. Carole, aged 45, is brought in after collapsing at home with chest pains. Tests reveal she has suffered a heart attack, so she undergoes an emergency procedure to unblock an artery. Philip, a 53-year-old psychiatrist, is rushed in following a seizure. Doctors suspect he might have suffered a stroke, but when it is revealed he was diagnosed with lung cancer several months earlier, registrar Chris believes it could be related. Finally, doctors treat 25-year-old Lucy, who is suffering severe headaches brought on by the build-up of excess spinal fluid in her head

programme.title: Rescue: Extreme Medics
programme.desc: A German tourist breaks her ankle while walking on a remote hillside, leaving her stranded. A quad bike rider comes off travelling at 50mph on a racetrack in Strathaven. Arriving on scene, medics must treat the patient's fractured arm immediately, before transporting him back to Glasgow for further treatment. On a small country road in rural Aberdeenshire, an 80-year-old lady is trapped in her car

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: Compilation episode of the most dramatic motorbike incidents the medics have dealt with. The team is pushed to its limit in a bid to save the life of motorcyclist Pete. Ian is in a critical condition after a crash in the Lake District, while in Berkshire, biker Hanna is trapped with multiple injuries after ploughing into a road sign

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Documentary following life inside the A&E department of St George's in south-west London. Carole, aged 45, is brought in after collapsing at home with chest pains. programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin is on the Canary Island of Tenerife helping husband and wife Teresa and Robin find their dream holiday home that they hope to retire to in the future. Having visited the island six times in the last few years, it's quickly become their favourite place. With five options lined up for their ¬£120,000 budget, will they find what they're looking for?

programme.title: Kirstie's House of Craft
programme.desc: How to make a tin-can dog and turn the humble loo roll into a host of fun and friendly animals

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Salsa-loving couple Colin Charles and Joy Walker cannot wait to buy a holiday home on the popular Costa Blanca. However, the pressure is really on for Ben Hillman to get it right, as it's the first time the couple have brought a property together. For their budget of ¬£200,000, can Ben Hillman deliver the perfect property in the perfect location and do they make an offer?

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: Two ex-casino employees start a new life in Portugal's Algarve running a restaurant, while a horse lover from Somerset prepares to move to Italy to open a pony-trekking business

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien search for more items to fix up and sell on, visiting the Isle of Wight to meet a couple who have lots of unwanted militaria in their sheds. While Henry embarks on an ambitious project to turn y tank parts into hanging baskets, Simon plans to transform old insulators into studio flat lighting

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: In Cumbria, Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien visit collector Paula, who badly needs some cash to fix her leaking roof. Henry picks a Morris Minor for restoration, while Simon turns some unwanted wood into furniture that seriously impresses independent valuer Ronnie Archer-Morgan

programme.title: Heir Hunters
programme.desc: The probate detectives investigate the affairs of a former insurance worker who has died leaving a valuable estate in Battersea, south London. Meanwhile, the case of a bus fanatic reveals the story of how a band of eagle-eyed servicemen defended Britain's shores

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Former art dealers Robin and Brenda Spence host first, at Causilgey Manor in Truro, Cornwall. Leoni and Tish from The Chocolate Box are stumped by the decor, and Julie and Jason from The Buckle Seaford react unfavourably to the bathroom with a glass roof. The B&Bers bond at an owl sanctuary, but cracks begin to appear at dinner when Martin and Tracey of Elmfield B&B come clean with their thoughts on the wall hangings. In the morning, Robin and Brenda show that breakfast isn't all about fry-ups, but Jason and Julie's loo-with-a-view leaves the hosts with egg on their faces

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to Elmfield B&B in Devon, where retired politician Martin Perry and housekeeper Tracey Barrett pride themselves on keeping things traditional

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week takes place at the Chocolate Box in Bournemouth, where the hosts playful approach leaves their guests questioning their business credentials

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit is to the Buckle Seaford B&B in East Sussex, where an afternoon of football confirms the women's suspicions about hosts Julie and Jason Martin's competitive streak

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&B owners meet for the last time, and Causilgey Manor owners Robin and Brenda want to get to grips with Julie and Jason's gripes over privacy

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp scours the south coast for Jo, Kev and their 15-year-old daughter Cody, who was born with cerebral palsy. The family hope to find a home that Cody can live in long term, so it will need space for a hydrotherapy pool, physio room and annexes for potential future carers. But with so much to consider, can they all agree on just one house? Phil Spencer helps Alice and Jack, first-time buyers who want a home within walking space of the sea

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer travel to the village of Clifford, West Yorkshire, to meet Vic and Paul Miller, who are unsure whether to sell or upgrade their house. Vic feels that the pair should look for a new home more suitable for them and their two young twins, but Paul believes they could use the budget to transform the property's layout and create a more functional family space

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau
programme.desc: With no guests to entertain at the chateau this year, the overhaul of the orangery continues. All the family come together to build an open kitchen, create a pop-up restaurant and cook a menu of memories featuring dishes from Dick and Angel's years together

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud meets Tom and Danielle Raffield, whose lifelong passion has been steam-bending wood. They've used the technique to create extraordinary furniture and lighting, but now plan to use it on a larger scale. In an attempt to escape the confines of their tiny gamekeeper's lodge, they have decided to build a wavy wooden house in South Cornwall, completed with curved cladding, twisted furniture and interior walls covered with weathered timber. With a ¬£100,000 budget, the pair have decided to do a lot of the building themselves, and Kevin is on hand to discover whether they're up to the challenge

programme.title: World's Greatest Train Journeys from Above
programme.desc: Aerial footage of railway journeys, exploring spectacular scenery and engineering, and meeting the people who live and work alongside them. In the opening episode, the Glacier Express is filmed from above, winding along alpine peaks to connect St Moritz and Zermatt. Engineers battle deep snow drifts, harness the latest tech to protect the line from landslides, and set explosives to guard against deadly avalanches

programme.title: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Real-life footage reveals some of the dangers lurking inside homes, from bugs and the chaos caused by animals and children to dodgy DIY and conflict with neighbours. Psychologists also reflect on the anxieties that can be caused for homeowners experiencing these situations while trying to relax

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Staff at St George's Hospital tackle one of their most dramatic emergencies when 60-year-old rail worker Alan is airlifted to the helipad after being hit by a high-speed train. A CT scan reveals he has suffered multiple fractures and loss of blood flow to his right arm. Without circulation he will lose the limb, so the medical team tries everything to save it, including complicated surgery. Meanwhile, 95-year-old Betty is brought in after experiencing breathing difficulties at home, and retired engineer James, 63, has a nasty cut to his head and weakness in his arms following a tumble down the stairs

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: Paramedics are called to a custody suite in Birmingham to deal with a prisoner who is aggressive and abusive but may have overdosed on heroin. Paramedic Rob Moore and student paramedic Ally Shipway tread a fine line between looking after him and themselves. At the same time, across the city, paramedics Jo Hardwick and Peter Bowles are called to a man who is found unconscious at the roadside

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Sean Lock is joined by Liza Tarbuck to battle guest captain Sarah Millican and team-mate Romesh Ranganathan as Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy panel quiz show mash-up. Susie Dent is ably assisted by Phill Jupitus in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley deals with the numbers and letters

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
